attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a badly needed improvement for the A140 for both road users & the community it passes through at Long Stratton, the bypass is described as ready to go with all research, land purchases, route etc all in place, the only factor missing is the funding. We petition the prime minister to put funding into place and construct this bypass immediately.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bypass Long Stratton."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13308.asp

Prime Minister's Office
